extensionDescription.message: Genera contraseñas seguras aleatorias y memorables

useNumbersTooltip.message: Add numbers (0-9) to strengthen the password.

useLettersTooltip.message: Use a mix of upper (A-Z) and lower (a-z) case letters.

useNumberMemorableTooltip.message: Include numbers (0-9) to make your password stronger.

useCharactersMemorableTooltip.message: Use symbols like @, #, $ to add complexity to your password.

useUppercaseMemorableTooltip.message: Capital letters (A-Z) can help secure your password further.
